display_name: [Adventurous Girl's Love at First Sight] Bulma (Bunny)

kit.leader_skill: "DB Saga" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +130%

super_attack.name: Yamcha's Determined Rescue!
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF by 86% for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Seals Super Attack

passive_skill.name: Bulma's Dream
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 150% up; (Forever) High chance of evading enemy's attack; (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; (Forever) "DB Saga", "Earth-Bred Fighters" or "Peppy Gals" Category allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 50% up; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 186% up; When another 2 or more "Earth-Bred Fighters" Category allies are on the team: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow Ki Spheres; Before receiving an attack within the turn: Chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up; For every attack evaded: (Forever) Chance of evading enemy's attack 5% up (up to 20%)

lines.text: High chance of evading enemy's attack
Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack
"DB Saga", "Earth-Bred Fighters" or "Peppy Gals" Category allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 50% up

lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki

lines.text: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow Ki Spheres
lines.context: When another 2 or more "Earth-Bred Fighters" Category allies are on the team

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up
lines.context: Before receiving an attack within the turn

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack 5% up (up to 20%)
